programme.title: What are Animals put on Earth For?
programme.short_synopsis: The news that "Fur is back", leads Alistair Cook to explore why it never really went away.
programme.medium_synopsis: Upon finding that "Fur is back" Alistair Cook reasons America's climate is the reason it never actually went away.
